channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens Chicago with "Department of WAR" ahead of planned crackdown
item.description: President Trump on Saturday threatened to unleash "the Department of WAR " on Chicago in a Truth Social image evoking the film "Apocalypse Now." Why i...

item.title: Trump breaks from RFK on vaccines: "Pure and simple, they work"
item.description: President Trump said he's supportive of vaccines on Friday, breaking with Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Why it matters: Kennedy has faced wid...

item.title: America's blue-collar workforce is shrinking
item.description: America's blue-collar workforce is shrinking, as President Trump's policies hit the same sectors he vowed to reinvigorate. Why it matters : Hiring is ...

item.title: White House opens door to lower tariffs on some food, pharma products
item.description: The White House says it will consider lowering tariffs on hundreds of products across sectors including food and pharmaceuticals, depending on what sp...

item.title: Scoop: Biden officials raised concerns with how he issued pardons, used autopen
item.description: High-ranking Biden administration officials repeatedly questioned and criticized how the president's team decided on controversial pardons and allowed...

item.title: MAGA has a new cautionary tale: England
item.description: Anti-Muslim rhetoric was prominent at a conference where Trump administration allies called Britain the “canary in the coal mine” for problems they at...

item.title: Biden chooses Delaware for presidential library, picks board to raise funds
item.description: The exact site for the center has not been chosen, but the 46th president has a close affiliation with the University of Delaware.

item.title: The Republican economist who says Trump is wrong about almost everything
item.description: A top adviser for George W. Bush, John McCain and congressional GOP leaders gives his thoughts on where the conservative project went awry.

item.title: West Point alumni group cancels award ceremony for Tom Hanks
item.description: The decision follows a series of political controversies involving the Trump administration that have rattled the prestigious military institution.

item.title: Why is Trump intervening in the New York City mayor’s race?
item.description: The president has made no secret of his dislike of Zohran Mamdani, the leader in a crowded field that includes Andrew Cuomo and incumbent Eric Adams.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
